content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on September 06, 2014 18:00:15_

Currently when a choice is displayed the associated card image is displayed in a popup only if the mouse cursor is over the space used by the actionButton component (top right area). It should be displayed when the mouse cursor is over any part of the choice panel so that you can easily refer to the card before making a choice.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=681_
